snippet: Police in Wixom, Mich., arrested a suspect they believe to be a highway gunman responsible for 24 attacks, which made residents of the Detroit suburb nervously eye each passing car for weeks.
abstract: Police in Wixom, Mich, arrest Raulie Wayne Casteel, suspect they believe to be highway gunman responsible for 24 separate shooting attacks, which wounded only one person but rattled entire community; charges include assault with intent to commit murder; Detroit suburb is unaccustomed to serious crime.
lead_paragraph: Police in Wixom, Mich., arrested a suspect they believe to be a highway gunman responsible for 24 attacks, which made residents of the Detroit suburb nervously eye each passing car for weeks.

headline.seo: Wixom, Mich., Shooting Suspect Is Arrested
headline.main: Man Held in Shootings That Terrorized Michigan Town
headline.print_headline: Man Held in Shootings That Terrorized Michigan Town
